availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: C.E. Blewitt (Warren County, Kentucky, attorney and judge )

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, attorney and judge. Kentucky native. Married to Adeline Blewitt. Attorney in Warren County, Kentucky in 1850. Clerk of County Court in Warren County, Kentucky in 1860. Judge of Warren County Court in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, p. 3A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 2, p. 571.
KYR-0001-003-0083.
